extends RequestImpl<RESPONSE_TYPE>

    • Method Detail

      • processAsyncResponse

        void processAsyncResponse(RESPONSE_TYPE _response)
        Process the response to this request.
        Parameters:
        _response - The response to this request.

      • setNoHungRequestCheck

        void setNoHungRequestCheck()
        Disable check for hung request. This must be called when a response must wait for a subsequent request.

      • getPendingResponseCount

        int getPendingResponseCount()
        Returns a count of the number of subordinate requests which have not yet responded.
        Returns:
        A count of the number of subordinate requests which have not yet responded.

      • processAsyncException

        void processAsyncException(java.lang.Exception _response)
        Returns an exception as a response instead of throwing it. But regardless of how a response is returned, if the response is an exception it is passed to the exception handler of the request that did the call or send on the request.
        Parameters:
        _response - An exception.

      • setExceptionHandler

        ExceptionHandler<RESPONSE_TYPE> setExceptionHandler(ExceptionHandler<RESPONSE_TYPE> _exceptionHandler)
        Replace the current ExceptionHandler with another.

        When an event or request message is processed by a targetReactor, the current exception handler is set to null. When a request is sent by a targetReactor, the current exception handler is saved in the outgoing message and restored when the response message is processed.

        Parameters:
        _exceptionHandler - The exception handler to be used now. May be null if the default exception handler is to be used.
        Returns:
        The exception handler that was previously in effect, or null if the default exception handler was in effect.

      • send

        <RT> void send(Request<RT> _request,
               AsyncResponseProcessor<RT> _responseProcessor)
        Send a subordinate request, providing the originating request is not canceled.
        Type Parameters:
        RT - The type of result value.
        Parameters:
        _request - The subordinate request.
        _responseProcessor - A callback to handle the result value from the subordinate request.

      • send

        <RT,RT2> void send(Request<RT> _request,
                   AsyncResponseProcessor<RT2> _dis,
                   RT2 _fixedResponse)
        Send a subordinate request, providing the originating request is not canceled.
        Type Parameters:
        RT - The response value type of the subordinate request.
        RT2 - The fixed response type.
        Parameters:
        _request - The subordinate request.
        _dis - The callback to handle a fixed response when the result of the subordinate request is received.
        _fixedResponse - The fixed response to be used.

      • cancel

        boolean cancel(RequestImpl _requestImpl)
        Cancel a subordinate RequestImpl.
        Parameters:
        _requestImpl - The subordinate RequestImpl.
        Returns:
        True if the subordinate RequestImpl was canceled.

      • cancelAll

        void cancelAll()
        Cancel all subordinate RequestImpl's.
